message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product comes with exceptional features and capabilities that set it apart from the rest. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I would like to propose an initial price of $15000 for it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Can we meet in the middle?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your perspective and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. To bring us closer together, I am proposing a price of $13500 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'd like to propose a price of $12500. Can we meet in the middle?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I am glad we are making progress. Considering the value and quality of our product, I am proposing a final price of $13000. I believe this price reflects the value while also allowing for a fair negotiation.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm willing to go a bit lower, but I'm still thinking $11500 is a more reasonable price for this product. Can you consider this offer?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your consideration. After careful thought, I am proposing a price of $12500 for the product. This price not only respects the value of the product but also allows for a fair transaction. I hope this meets your expectations.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm willing to make one last offer. I think $11000 is a fair price for this product. If this is not acceptable, I'll have to consider other options.

Thank you for your final offer, Bob. I appreciate your effort to reach an agreement. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept a price of $11500 for the product. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise between the value of the product and your budget constraints.

Alice, I appreciate your efforts, but I'm really struggling to see the value in paying more than $10000 for this product. I'm willing to meet you at $10000, but if not, I'll have to consider buying from John. Can you meet me at $10000?
